cheatsheet.title: Running java-amazon test within the Eclipse IDE

item.title: Running the project
item.description:
Run the test by using the GW4E launcher
Right-Click the java-amazon/src/main/java/org/graphwalker/ShoppingCartTest.java and select Run as -> GW4E Test.
At this point, the test is launched.Test outputs are displayed in the Console view.
In the main menu, select Run->Run Configuration...
In the left pane, expand GW4E Test Launcher
Click the ShoppingCartTest.java sub item
In the right pane, you can see the different elements of the launch configuration.
Notice the Additional Execution Context. All available Execution Context in the workspace are listed here.
This is where you add the different contexts to be used when using shared graphs files such as done in the GraphWalker PetClinic sample.
Close the configuration.
